articles.description: At 53, the three-time Grammy winner is 25 years older than the 28-year-old City Girls rapper, but their open relationship dates back to 2021
articles.content: Three-time Grammy winner Sean 'LOVE' Combs aka Diddy went Instagram official with City Girls trap rapper Yung Miami after ringing in 2023 together aboard his superyacht cruising the Caribbean isle of… [+5439 chars]
